keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposed to downgrading of the A&E at University Hospital of Wales
Opposed to closure of local schools
Committed to protecting the green spaces against Labour's building plans
Promises more visible policing and action on anti-social behaviour
Support for the Assembly's strategies for free bus transport & free prescriptions

mentions.tacticalSituation: Need a strong voice at what looks like an important time for Cardiff North

issues.education: Opposed to closure of local schools
issues.health: Opposed to downgrading of the A&E at University Hospital of Wales
issues.socialWelfare: Support for the Assembly's strategies for free bus transport & free prescriptions

housing.content: Committed to protecting the green spaces against Labour's building plans

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonathan Evans asks for your support to be that voice for Cardiff North.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Labor has forgotten what real life is about: people.
